message.content:
cs.AR, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.SE, cs.PL

The paper proposes a hardware mechanism for adapting error correcting DRAM modules to offer multiple levels of error protection and provide additional capacity to applications. This work involves computer architecture (cs.AR) and system-level design and implementation (cs.DC), as well as system-level optimization and performance evaluation (cs.SY). The paper also discusses the trade-offs involved in arranging data within ECC DRAM, which falls under software engineering (cs.SE) and programming languages (cs.PL).
